thread.title: BRIEF-Glencore PLC Says Acquired Securities Of Polymet Mining Corp For "Investment Purposes"

title: BRIEF-Glencore PLC Says Acquired Securities Of Polymet Mining Corp For "Investment Purposes"

organizations.name: brief-glencore plc says acquired securities of polymet mining corp
brief-glencore plc says acquired securities of pol

text:
April 4, 2018 / 12:51 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Glencore PLC Says Acquired Securities Of Polymet Mining Corp For "Investment Purposes" Reuters Staff 
April 4 (Reuters) - Polymet Mining Corp: 
* GLENCORE PLC SAYS ACQUIRED SECURITIES OF POLYMET MINING CORP FOR “INVESTMENT PURPOSES” - SEC FILING 
* GLENCORE PLC-HAVE HELD DISCUSSIONS, MAY CONTINUE TO HOLD DISCUSSIONS, WITH POLYMET MINING CORP REGARDING EQUITY, DEBT FINANCING REQUIREMENTS, SOURCES ‍​‍​ 
* GLENCORE PLC - INTEND TO CONTINUE TO EVALUATE POLYMET MINING’S BUSINESS, FINANCIAL CONDITION, CAPITAL STRUCTURE AND OTHER RELEVANT FACTORS‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2Jgr360 ) Further company coverage:
